<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Default class name to Location for all cmn location records where class name is empty</description>
        <name>Populate class name for cmn location</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[defaultClassNameForLocation();

function defaultClassNameForLocation() {
    try {
        var result = sn_fd.FlowAPI.startSubflow('sn_wsd_core.populate_class_name_for_cmn_location');
    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error('WSD: Exception while executing fix Script for populating class name for cmn location: ' + ex);
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-30 06:48:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>132daae95322011023e9ddeeff7b1209</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Populate class name for cmn location</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_132daae95322011023e9ddeeff7b1209</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-30 09:26:07</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Populate class name for cmn location
